title: Convex Client for TanStack Start
description: Convex client setup for TanStack Start with React Query integration and authentication support
docs:
## Post-Install Setup

1. Run `npx convex dev` to start the Convex dev server and get your deployment URL.

2. Copy the deployment URL to your `.env` file as `VITE_CONVEX_URL`.

3. Wrap your app with the `ConvexAuthProvider` from `lib/convex/provider.tsx`.
